tool.name: Combine DataFrames [SPAC] [DMAP]
tool.description: Combine two dataframes into one for downstream processes.\ Please refer to DUET Documentation, GitHub Documentation for further information.
tool.command: echo '{"dataframe": {"type": "file", "name": "dataframe.csv"}}' > outputs_config.json && python '$__tool_directory__/format_values.py' 'galaxy_params.json' 'cleaned_params.json' --inject-outputs --outputs-config outputs_config.json && python -c "from spac.templates.combine_dataframes_template import run_from_json; run_from_json('cleaned_params.json')"
tool.help: **Combine DataFrames [SPAC] [DMAP]** Combine two dataframes into one for downstream processes.\ Please refer to DUET Documentation, GitHub Documentation for further information. **Outputs:** - dataframe: file (dataframe.csv)
